```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
tags$div(class="container-fluid",

                    background-size: cover;

                 style="text-align: center; align-content: center;",

                 tags$br(),
                 tags$br(),
                 tags$h1(class="genshin_font",
                    style="color: #1c1c22",
                    "Site em construção"),
                 tags$br(),
                 tags$br()
                 )
        ))
```
